00003 import java.util.Hashtable;
00004 import java.util.Vector;
00005 
00006 import newtonERP.logging.Logger;
00007 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00008 import newtonERP.orm.Orm;
00009 import newtonERP.orm.associations.AccessorManager;
00010 import newtonERP.orm.field.Field;
00011 import newtonERP.orm.field.Fields;
00012 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldInt;
00013 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldText;
00014 
00019 public class Specification extends AbstractOrmEntity
00020 {
00023         public Specification()
00024         {
00025                 super();
00026                 setVisibleName("Spécification");
00027                 AccessorManager.addAccessor(this, new SearchEntity());
00028         }
00029 
00030         @Override
00031         public Fields initFields()
00032         {
00033                 Vector<Field<?>> fieldList = new Vector<Field<?>>();
00034 
00035                 fieldList.add(new FieldInt("Numéro", getPrimaryKeyName()));
00036                 fieldList.add(new FieldText("Description", "name", false));
00037                 fieldList.add(new FieldInt("Entité de recherche", new SearchEntity()
00038                                 .getForeignKeyName()));
00039                 return new Fields(fieldList);
00040         }
00041 
00047         public boolean isSatisfied(Hashtable<String, String> entityParameters,
00048                         boolean isStraightSearch)
00049         {
00050                 Logger
00051                                 .info("[TASKMODULE] Vérification à savoir si une spécification est satisfaite");
00052 
00053                 AbstractOrmEntity searchEntity = getSearchEntity();
00054 
00055                 if (isStraightSearch)
00056                 {
00057                         if (!entityParameters.containsKey(searchEntity.getPrimaryKeyName()))
00058                                 return false;
00059                         else if (entityParameters.get(searchEntity.getPrimaryKeyName())
00060                                         .equals("&"))
00061                                 return false;
00062 
00063                         searchEntity.setData(searchEntity.getPrimaryKeyName(),
00064                                         entityParameters.get(searchEntity.getPrimaryKeyName()));
00065                 }
00066 
00067                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> result = Orm.select(searchEntity);
00068 
00069                 if (result.size() > 0)
00070                         return true;
00071                 return false;
00072         }
00073 
00074         private AbstractOrmEntity getSearchEntity()
00075         {
00076                 SearchEntity searchEntity = (SearchEntity) getSingleAccessor(new SearchEntity()
00077                                 .getForeignKeyName());
00078 
00079                 return searchEntity.getEntity();
00080         }
00081 }
